short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'Pokemon Go' with 'Go Outside and Talk to people'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is another one of those headline / article plugins. 

Replace all the buzz about PokÃ©monGo with what it really is - going outside and talking to people. 

Credit to PJ Vogt for the idea and Eric Bailey's Millenial -> Snake People extension. 

Feel free to have at it here: https://github.com/UmbleC/pokemon-go-to-outside
